mapper.update: update DOC_FOLDER set FOLDER_NAME = #{folderName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PARENT_ID = #{parentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CREATOR_ID = #{creatorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REMARKS = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATOR_DEPT_ID = #{creatorDeptId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATOR_NAME = #{creatorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATOR_DEPT_NAME = #{creatorDeptName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select ID, FOLDER_NAME, PARENT_ID, CREATE_TIME, CREATOR_ID, REMARKS, CREATOR_DEPT_ID, CREATOR_NAME, CREATOR_DEPT_NAME from DOC_FOLDER where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select ID, FOLDER_NAME, PARENT_ID, CREATE_TIME, CREATOR_ID, REMARKS, CREATOR_DEPT_ID, CREATOR_NAME, CREATOR_DEPT_NAME from DOC_FOLDER
